historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 47-2853.28.

Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 15-354 substituted "Attorney General for the District of Columbia" for "Corporation Counsel".

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-261, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2801.

For Law 15-354, see notes following § 47-340.03.

DC CODE § 47-2853.28

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Prosecutions for violations of this subchapter shall be brought in the name of the District of Columbia by the Attorney General for the District of Columbia.
In any prosecution brought under this subchapter, any person claiming an exemption from regulation under this subchapter shall have the burden of providing entitlement to the exemption.

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Non-Health Related Occupations and Professions Licensure.
